mapper.select: select count(case when Part_Age=10 then 1 end) as age_10, count(case when Part_Age=20 then 1 end) as age_20, count(case when Part_Age=30 then 1 end) as age_30, count(case when Part_Age=40 then 1 end) as age_40, count(case when Part_Age=50 then 1 end) as age_50, count(case when Part_Age=60 then 1 end) as age_60 from survey.participation;
